short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type poynesian characters (w/macrons) into web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will allow you to type Hawaiian (Polynesian) characters into any web input controls.  

alt + <vowel> key combination to enter the vowel w/macron

Double tapping the shift THEN hitting a vowel will get you an uppercase vowel w/macron:

shift, shift THEN <vowel> 

alt + ' will get you the glottal stop character or â€˜okina

If this doesn't work for you then the input has been blocked by the creator and you should try using Polynesian Text extension:

https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/polynesian-text/pbkcmmgdieaaamaenbaakbgjfniblmbc
